content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We were walking to home, discussing about ison and how it will be more visible these days and we were seeing the sky and the stars. and then, over our heads straight at the sky, a glowing green light, turning visible out of nowhere, and taking a straight line path in tremedous speed and the dissapears again.
content.summary: A glowing green light, turning visible out of nowhere, and taking a straight line path in tremedous speed and the dissapears again.

content.detailedDescription: It was a friday night. heading from marana to picture rocks when the object caught my eye. it was very very big triangle shape. across the road there was 2 other vechiles that stopped and got out of there vehicle to watch what was in the sky. at first i thought maybe it was military until i seen it change shapes and colors. it went straight up and down to sideways. it went very very dim and slowly started moving. to slow for a plane and or helicopter. then it got very very very bright and huge in shape. like a triangle shape..Boomerang shape..I have a video of it.But i captured the red and white rapid lights and is jumping around quickly. after i stopped filming is when my brother jn law and my fiance seen it change shape.My brother in law took a picture ..Straight up in the sky and captured a orange orb.I have a video .But in my video you can see the object lights and how fast and slow patters it makes.But can see the shape as good as i seen it with my eyes. the video shows rapid movement and light patterns i was standing still and you can see the object moving crazy like. sorry for the cuss words i was in shock..But what i describe happend after i filmed. but the rest of what i described is on the video.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very large in shape. fast rapid light movement. .Changed shapes.Went dim to very very bright.

content.detailedDescription: We were heading home after trick or treating, we reached our destination 307 silver street, when all of sudden we spotted a oddly shaped thing in the sky hovering, it was like folded and then in a split second it was hovering over my apartment, it was black in color and football field in length. my daughter and my fiance were in such awe  we stepped out and looked up and inspected it. it was quiet & it had an arrow  shape light on the bottom. with in a few mins we realized it seemed to be inspecting us. it made zero noise and was yet hovering.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Football field black object with arrow light source on the bottom. zero noise with the ability to hover quietly.

content.detailedDescription: I was at sunoco.Working..After last sighting i watch the sky evry evening from 4.30 pm til alnost dark to my west..After seeing the last few ufos last week i always use my binoculars to be sure of what im looking at...Ufo.S...First 2 objects just appeared in the sky.They were visible for about 25 to 35 seconda.. i saw them again about a minute later..1 was higher than the other at about 45 degrees following the 1 in front  this lasted about aminute then they were out of sight..The 4 th ufo was following a passenger jet.. when i was watching the sky i saw the jet and realised it was bein followed by something quite larger..I looked closer with my binoculars anit was cigar shaped asout 300 to 400 feet long 30 feet top to bottom  it was a silver or chrome it was very shiny..It was traling the passenger jet about a half mile behind this lasted about 2 minutes.. this was so large some one besides myself had to see this..The area im talking about has become a real hot spot for ufos.. a few of my customers have seen ufos in same area..
content.summary: 2 white disc appearedthen gone30seconds.Saw again visible 1 followed the other2 minutes.Large cigar shape gollowed half mile behind jet 3 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: It is now 2013. in july 1982, about 3:00 pm, i was driving a taxi cab in st. paul, minnesota. i dropped off a fare, then drove to the nearest cab stand to park and wait for the next radio call to pick up another fare. the cab stand was at the corner of rice street and university avenue by the sears store, a very busy intersection for both cars and pedestrians. as i pulled onto the cab stand, i saw the sun in the sky shining directly in through my windshield, about 30 degrees above the horizon, shining very brightly into my eyes. i thought "oh great!" but then it started to make me feel good all over inside, which i thought was nice, but as the seconds passed, it kept making me feel better and better, and as more seconds passed, i realized that it was making me feel absolutely wonderful! the more it shined on me, the more the feelings of 'wonderfulness' grew! and it wouldn't stop! it kept on and on, growing and growing in strength, pouring into me as if it were filling me up each second with more and more... "love?", for lack of a better word. in fact, i don't think there is a better word for what it was filling me up with than 'love'! it was love! and the love kept right on increasing, more and more each second, and even though i was completely flooded in the rapture of this beaming 'sun', and loving every second of it and wishing it would last forever, i still was able to realize that something very out of the ordinary was happening here, so i started looking around at all of the traffic and pedestrians, sure that i would see all the cars and people stopped dead in their tracks and staring at this 'sun' as i was. but nobody else seemed to notice! this upset me, so i rolled down my window and started hollering at people, pointing at the sun and yelling things like "do you see that? do you feel that? right there! right there!" the people would look at me for a second, then just continue with what they were doing. they would look up in the direction i was pointing, but only for a second before returning to their routines. not a single person became even the least bit curious enough to ask me what they were supposed to be seeing! they weren't seeing it! they must have thought i was nuts! after staring into it for about 5 minutes, being exponentially filled with the love as each second ticked by, i thought that this is what 'heaven' must feel like! i thought wow, i never noticed the sun like that before! and completely mesmerized, i started the cab, turned left onto university avenue, and started a slow crawl from st. paul all the way into minneapolis, in a trance-like love-daze, winding my way through minneapolis until i got to lake calhoun, where i parked looking out at the water and feeling the "heaven" still inside me. i had lost all interest in picking up any more fares! i stayed there by the lake for at least two hours, probably much longer, and then the feelings of love started to subside within me. as the love retreated, i started to feel very sad that it was leaving and that try as i might, i could not make it stay! in hindsight, it was like people who have had near death experiences describe when say that they were filled with love when they 'entered the light', but then when they were made to return to earth, the love left them and they could not keep hold of it and that made them feel very sad... heartbroken! that's how i felt as the love was subsiding in me! i became very angry with myself for leaving the 'sun' back at rice and university, thinking "you dummy! why did you leave?!" i started driving back to st. paul when two things occurred to me. first, i was able to stare right into that "sun" for the entire 5 minutes without any damage to my eyes! and second, the cab stand at rice and university was located on rice street, at the southeast corner of the intersection, facing directly north. now i'm no astronomer, but i would bet you dollars to doughnuts that the sun has never appeared 30 degrees above the horizon in the northern sky in the entire history of this planet! so what did i see? well, i've had many years to think about it, and believe me, i think about it nearly every day, wishing that i could get that feeling of heavenly love back! nobody else could feel what i was feeling, even as i was trying my best to point it out to them. this leads me to believe that whatever it was, it was meant for only me. why? beats me. i haven't a clue! what was it? well, it was in the air, and although it was stationary and not flying and looked exactly like the sun, it was in the northern sky and so definitely unidentifiable (not the sun). i have to conclude it was a ufo. what was the feeling of love it poured into me? i think it was possibly an experiment, perhaps to see how i would react. i hope whatever they/it learned from my reaction does not lead to the development of something sinister to be used against us in the future, but what a perfect weapon when you think about it... make everybody on earth feel how i was feeling when filled with their 'love', then invade. who would want to shoot back? so i'm a bit torn by the experience. on the one hand, i wish i could feel like that forever. on the other hand, i'm a bit angry that someone or something would mess with me like that. at least it wasn't your basic run of the mill alien abduction with the all too common accompanying orifice probes, so that's a big plus in my book!!! believe me? disbelieve me? i don't care. it was what it was. i haven't experienced anything like that since... kind of wish i could though! i wonder if anyone else has been subjected to such an event?
content.summary: Bright sun-like light

content.detailedDescription:
We were fishing in the harbor at naval base, guam when we observed a bright green cone shaped light streak accross the sky from south to north. there was no sound and it light up the whole area.  it disaperaed accross the horizion.  we didn't think too much about it until after we saw a show about ufo's where 2 airline pilots saw the same green light pass by their aircraft. 

we have also observed a faint white blinking light that appeared to be at a very high altitude, possibly outside of the earth's attmosphere and it was doing circular movement. we observed this light on numerous occassions at the same time several nights in a row. again there was no sound and no military activity in the area.
content.summary: Green conned shape trailing light.

content.detailedDescription: Me & the family were headed south on rt 30 from sudbury towards castleton just as we broke the crest of the ridge after lake hortino it was in the sky above about 6 degrees off the horizon, the sun was intensely reflecting off of it, at first i thougth the sun had moved, but you could see the sun was still sw & this was se, i woudl say it was about 1/8 the size of the sun in the sky that afternoon, just as i had to watch the road & looked back up it was gone
content.summary: Was large reflecting sunlike appeard 1/8 teh size of the sun

content.detailedDescription: i was out in our yard about 8:30 on the night of november 7,2013 and first noticed 2 very bright lights coming towards me from the east, like spotlights very low in the sky right over backyard. called for my husband to come out and we both watched this fly right over our heads just above the treeline. it was quite large, triangular (ish) in shape. the lights were spread out on the front of the craft. it was quiet but did make a low noise like some kind of engine. it flew very slow towards the south and in the distance as it flew away from us it appeared to tilt toward its left side (lights were no longer pointing straight ahead and turned to a more northward direction. we live right outside of somers point nj and it appeared to come right over the garden state parkway toward our home,so i am hoping other people saw this as well. we have seen stealth bombers in our area as nafac is not far from here. i do not know if this type of craft has lights on either side (very bright) and can fly this low to the ground. i did manage to run inside after it flew over and tried to get a video of it as it tilted and flew north. i will try to post this once i get it zoomed in and downloaded.
content.summary: Triangular, black low flying craft with very bright white lights

content.detailedDescription: About 9:23 oct 8th i picked up my grandson and his friend from their ffa meeting out in the country. turned north on s.R.380 from spirngvalley paintersville road and noticed about 14 orange lights ahead to the right, at first we thought they were radio towers then realized there are no towers there. then i thought that is alot of helicopters all togeather so we sped up to get there and see them. i started to realize it was not quite what we thought. we stoped right under the lights and rolled down our windows. looking straight up as they passed over us they were aprox 150 feet above the car. they made no sound at all. they looked like orange lights with a slight glow around them. you coukd not see any object they were mounted to just the lights. they were moving south west about 20 mile an hour and as they got about a half mile from us they would dim and dissappear. i tried to do all the math to figure this out. the wind was blowing towards us so it couldnt have been a blimp. i didnt think about it at the time but there were about 14 of these lights half were alittle higher than the other half. they moved at the same speed and held their position in the formation. since we couldnt see the object could it have been one large object with all these lights attached ? if thats true it was a very large object. we were all very interested nobody was scared. it took me 52 years to see something likt this it was very cool i just have no clue as to what we saw. and the car engine did no die.
content.summary: Orange glowing lights

content.detailedDescription: Flying vary slow no head lights playing jet sound 1 big red light flashing off and on orange flashing light two white lights in back look up in the sky on a clear nighy u see something with flashing lights no head light its a ufo have been studing them for two years now i no what they look like i have had them in front of me flashing the lights at me might have been 50 feet of the ground no sound at all thats all i have to say
content.summary: Flying vary slow playing jet sound was not a jet

content.detailedDescription: First off i was sober i take no meds and i do respect this site. i seen the star that many see this is not the orbs or whatever this is what i call the yoke very up close above my hood 2 inches from my windshield here is what i can tell you.... i got a cup of coffee at a local mini mart and drove off it at first looked like a bright light passing across the road. i thought ok an atv wanted to pass in front of me with a super bright sylvania like light so i slowed down here it was not an atv 4 wheeler it was a star like possibly fish or alien creature i had to slow down and actually stop because i did not want to hit it best way to describe it is it is like a 6ft yoke of an egg with 8 or more sharp triangular points potruding out of it and if it spins fast it could be like a chain saw kinda like the top of the statue of liberty this thing has a center that is like an egg yoke so very bright it looks like a star white from a distance but more yellow egg when you get close i watched this unknown creature almost hit my windshield it somehow knew it was above my hood then spun tilted and arced the top 2 of the bones with webbing to catch wind lifted up the white fish like bones that had a webbing in between each and it lifted up spun for me got out of the way then landed in the woods. it was so bright it landed in the woods i was not going back.
content.summary: I thought it was a bright atv crossing road sloved down to see a flying entity

content.detailedDescription:
ok before i get started i know this will sound crazy or like i was on hallucinogens or something and nobody thinks im telling the truth. im just wondering if anyone had something similar. this happened several years ago to me but i remember it vividly like it was yesterday.
     i was in greensboro nc out in front of the house i lived in at the time. after watching letterman i went outside to lock the car doors and looked up and noticed a very bright star that seem as if it was getting brighter and brighter. the more i looked the brighter it got but it was not getting brighter it was getting closer, before i realized it was within arms reach and i felt like i couldn't turn away no matter how hard i tried. it was scanning through my eyes with some sort of laser it was like it was reading all my memories like files in a computer. literally 1000s of images from a baby till the present flowing and i could see the images as it was scanning and i know they were from my mind because well i remembered so many of them. i remember feeling like it was searching for something particular. 
      it reminded me of the old saying that your life will flash before you when you die. once it finished my mind was blank for what seemed like just a min or two like white. i don't remember going back inside at all and my next memory was eveything was jumping up down side to side eradically and it had me freaking so i ran to the mirror my eyes were wiggling all over the place and would'nt stop i called for my wife and she witnessed the spasming of my eyes it went on 20 mins or so and she noticed a wierd mark on my chest in the shape of the letter c its still there as of this day. for months after i would dream periodically that i was inside something that had monitors or screens and buttons from the inside it was round with walls covered some sort of wavy liquid. i still wonder if the dream was some sort of memory? so thats basically it.
content.summary: Star seemed like it was brightening, actually got within one foot or so.

content.detailedDescription: I was star gazing and saw first one craft soundlessly hover and then move across sky. after a few minutes a second craft appeared at a lower altitude. could have been the same craft appearing for the light was the same color and no sound with smooth and seamless motion across sky.
content.summary: I was watching the stars at the beach and saw 2 crafts

content.detailedDescription: It was the summer, a couple weeks before i started the 7th grade. i was in my backyard with two of my friends and we were talking about the upcoming school year. as i was talking, i was looking toward the west, when all of the sudden, i spotted a red-pink 'ball' in the sky. i pointed it out to my friends, who also saw it. we watched it moving fairly slowly toward the ne. it seemed to be between 1000 and 1500 ft in the air and appeared to be about the size of a beach ball held out at arms length. the object was a sphere that glowed a red-pink. there was a darker grey, grid-like pattern on the surface, and it looked like the red-pink glow was coming from the center of each grid box. the glow would get brighter and then dim, but didn't seem to be a steady pulsing, it was more random. we followed the object out to the street. i saw one of our neighbors outside in her garden and yelled at her to look up, as we ran over to her yard. i figured that it would be important to have a grown-up witness this too. she looked up and saw the sphere, and her comment at the time was something like, "oh, that, that's been flying over the past two nights."  she didn't seem to be phased by it at all.  i was stunned by her lack of amazement. the object continued toward the northeast and then it sped up and began to descend. we lost sight of it as it got further away and was blocked by trees and buildings. my friends were a little upset and decided to go home. i was totally excited, i knew i had just seen a ufo. i went inside to tell my parents, who were playing cards with the neighbors, but they were not interested. the next day i rode my bike to the police station where a family friend was the dispatcher, and i told her what i had seen and what the neighbor lady had said about it being around on the two prior evenings. she (the dispatcher) did call our local airport to see if there were any hot air balloons, weather balloons or aircraft in the area when i saw the object.  she said that there not. i was still excited, even though no one else was. it's obviously been many years since the sighting, but it is as clear to me now as if it happened last night. from that point on, i wanted to know all i could about such phenomena, and have tried to educate myself. it's something i think about quite often. it didn't scare me at the time. it was fascinating and exciting.
content.summary: Saw sphere moving overhead toward ne then it descended.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside with my boyfriend and he said what the heck is that. i turned around and saw 3 steady dull lights moving through the air quicker than any plane could fly. we watched it for 3 minutes until it flew into cloud cover and never saw it come out the other side. freaked us out.
content.summary: Triangle lights moving through the air

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.summary: Every night since 9/21/13 i have noticed a bright, shiny or glowing object in the atmosphere. it always appear and disappear at the same place, same time, like clockwork. also see s

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.summary: Been watching object since 9/21 - present. always appear at same time, place, and disappear same time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was renting a bed and breakfast cabin outside holyrood ks. while working in the area and had eaten supper this particular evening and was standing on the front porch which faced east. 
 at around 8:30 i was standing at the porch railing smoking a cigarette when i noticed a strange purple glow in the southeast sky. ar first it was just a thin faint glow but as i watched it got brighter until it was straight east of me and then it turned east and became what appeared to be approximately 6 by 10 or 12 feet across if it was within a half mile of my location. 
  the whole time i observed the light there was never a sound. on later reflection i realized the frogs in the pond close by were silent also. 
  the previous week and on days after we (fellow co-workers) observed f-117 fighters and b-2's and one b1b in the area but never saw anything different in the daylight. even an f-18 or two !
 i remember  telling my forman about the lights and tonight i called him to see if he remembered the dates and he couldn't recall the exact day but said he remembered me telling him.
 i never forgot the details and while watching an episode of alien mysteries on discovery about the stephensville sightings a rendering of the violet lights winking out brought it all back like it was yesterday !
content.summary: Violet glow traveling s to n, then turn east visibly receeding til winked out, looked as big as 16 ft garage door at first.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my brothers house when i pulled on my street i saw this object right in front of me it was coming at me going east it then made a hard 180 degree bank it then revealed its shape it was trianglar shaped and had three lights at each point. the lights were bright white in color. it also seemed to have some kind of lighting pattern. the way in which this object effortlessly made this turn was nothing i had ever seen. it seemed like the object was effortlessly moving. but after the hard turn it was gone in a matter of second. the object had no sound, nor left any exhaut trail. i believe i saw a ufo. this sighting occured on october 31, 2013 at approx 10 p.M.
content.summary: The object i observed was coming east, then banked a 180 degree turn, then going west. when the object made this incredible turn, it revealed its shape. the object was clearly triangular and had white lights at each point. it proceeded w. at speedsunknown

content.detailedDescription: Was sitting in the car talking to friend enjoying the evening sky. the way the full moon was casting shadows, there wasn't a cloud in in the sky.  the shadows disappeared i looked toward the moon to check out and there it was tree top high above our house. i was in the drive-way.  not even 50 ft from house. i got out of car went to the door opened it but did not go inside hollered for my mom to come look. we both stood there looking straight up at it not a noise, then the light came on ( we lived in an old 1 room school house) the trees were full grown maple trees.  light were circular and were red and white. then it started moving real slow got out away from house and shot straight up and disappeared
content.summary: Was a clear night with full moon, i looked up and there it was above our house tree top high

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from my brothers house when i pulled on my street i saw this object right in front of me it was coming at me going east it then made a hard 180 degree bank it then revealed its shape it was trianglar shaped and had three lights at each point. the lights were bright white in color. it also seemed to have some kind of lighting pattern. the way in which this object effortlessly made this turn was nothing i had ever seen. it seemed like the object was effortlessly moving. but after the hard turn it was gone in a matter of second. the object had no sound, nor left any exhaut trail. i believe i saw a ufo. this sighting occured on october 31, 2013 at approx 10 p.M.
content.summary: The object i observed was coming east, then banked a 180 degree turn, then going west. when the object made this incredible turn, it revealed its shape. the object was clearly triangular and had white lights at each point. it proceeded w. at speedsunknown

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had just moved into our new home in the country and i was watching the weather and there was a fast moving storm about on top of us coming out of the north west. i went outside and looked back over the house at the sky.I could see the storm front fast approaching  and riding on the very front of the clouds were 3 orbs in the shape of a triangle .I yelled for my wife and she came out. i pointed to them and she seen them also just then it was like they knew we had seen them they just faded out of sight . then i looked to the left a little and there were 4 more orbs floating in a slight arc.As i pointed at those they faded out also my wife ran into the house and wouldn't come back out . i was real close to those orbs and really thought they were alive like an organism . i have looked at the orbs on youtube and have seen similar orbs there
content.summary: Glowing orbs

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my front porch, taking out trash. i first noticed the object when i looked up at the sky, as i always do. at first, i thought it was a plane. however, i realized it wasn't as it was just hovering there in the sky, lights randomly flashing, the brightness dimming at first, then instantly brightening up! i can honestly say that i freaked out a bit. i knew for sure that that object was indeed not a plane! nervousness filled up inside me, yet i was still excited at the same time! that leads to how i lost sight of the object; curious to see much more than i could, i ran inside to get my binoculars. of course, when i came back outside, the object was gone! just like that. it was a spectacular sighting.
content.summary: The object was hovering in the sky, bright, colorful lights randomly flashing.

content.detailedDescription:
I need help with this, this is not the first time i have dealings with entitys, i have had it with this problem and need help.

please not that this is the second time i have met these beings: i had just gotten in my bed (its about 2-3 feet from the ceiling in my room) and i feel like i am having a heart attack, i i had a strong feeling of some one in my room and (from a laying position i roll over and place my arms flat on my pillow so i can see over the head of my bed) i look over and i see a 7 or 8 foot tall being, he/she is extremely dark and i cannot see any detail but a total of a black silhouette. it had never moved or touched me this time, it just stared at me. i have about a second of eye contact and i unexpectedly, and like a rag doll, pass out and crumple in my bed. i wake up late in the morning only because my dad had shaken me till i had become conscious. i lost sight of the being because i was unconscious, i have seen it/one of them before and i had not passed out on eye contact.  after this i feel completely powerless and in need of help.

i need help, please call me and my dad, i have experienced events previous to this and after, this is just one of the 4 or so events i have dealt with, please, im tired of the stress.
content.summary: Entitys causing me to pass out

content.detailedDescription:
Me & my mom (still living) were driving up the mountain out of powell valley on the new 4-lane hwy. we were listening to the radio & talking when suddenly a bright round light descended from the sky like it was out of thin air! as it got closer to the treeline it split into 3 "light objects" & separated. the middle one came straight down while the other 2 flew away from it at an angle & all 3hovered over the treeline for a bit. the middle started to ascend while the oother 2 (flying at an angle) met the center one as they were all ascending. at the exact second they met it became much brighter like a "flash" then back to the same intensity they were & the single light object (which was 3 at one point) began to ascend & disappeared into thin air!

while this was going on,  it was completely silent in the truck. after it disappeared, my mom looks over at me & says "did you see that?"...I said "what did you see?"...She said "those lights?"...I said "yeah, i saw them too." she replied "wonder what that was!?". i said "i don't know and i don't care to find out!"

we were petrified! we never spoke of it again for a long time. we sure didn't tell anyone else because we we're afraid people would think we were crazy. 

my grandmother was born & raised in our valley & always told me tales of alll the times she saw "lights on the mountains" while growing up. she was born in 1919 & would neverrr lie! she told me of different colored lights running back & forth on the sides of the mountains in the valley. she said they were really fast & would dart back & forth.

her cousin alwayssss said he saw "little blue men" at his cabin on the mountain. he said they just kept coming back to visit him. he neverrr changed his story. he swore to it til the day he died. his cabin still stands.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Me & mom driving up mountain. saw 1 light ball drop from sky, split into 3, hover separated over treeline, as center 1 asends other 2 meet into 1 & go straight back up & disappears in thin air

content.detailedDescription:
I was siting in my girlfriends kitchen on the eighth floor with my girlfriends son. i was sitting by the window smoking a cigarette, on the other side of me was the kitchen table and on the other side of the table sat my girlfriends son. we are sitting, having a conversation when all of a sudden the boy which is fourteen at the time picks his hand up, points past me out the window and ask me boomer whats that ? i turn to see what he is pointing at and to my surprise and amazement there directly across the street i see this white shinning "orb" of glowing white light hovering. i said what the hell i turn back to look at the child and he said wow i am going to grab my mom!! (from the next room) leaving me alone in the kitchen. i immediately turn back  to look at the object and as i did, the object started to glow brighter and more intense this occurred for 6 to ten seconds then as if reacting to the fact that they had been spotted an immense beam of light shot out bursting through the kitchen window hitting me in the chest violently pinning and paralyzing me against the wall, sucking all of the air out my body. i could not breath. at this point i am in a state of shock. the kitchen at that time got so bright that i could not see anything but light all of a sudden i feel some thing spinning violently in my stomach all of this occurring at once. this affect lasted for fifteen to twenty seconds. the light, like a vacuum gets sucked out of the kitchen everything comes back to view the spinning motion in my stomach stops as well and i am released from the wall collapsing to my knees crying uncontrollably. not wanting my girlfriend to see me like that i crawled on my knees slowly exiting her apartment trying to get next door to my friends apartment i knocked on his door he opens the door to see his friend on the ground crying uncontrollably i crawl into his apartment and cry "sobbing" after five to seven minutes past i start to regain my composure again, and he is begging me to tell him what just happen. i guess  the residual affect of what just happened wouldn't allow me to speak about it without crying and that night i would cry on and off for two hours. after regaining myself i cautiously walk back to my girlfriends apartment and asked her, did she or her soon notice anything funny in the kitchen? she responded no. i asked her son why didn't you bring your mother back to the kitchen to show her the object? his response was that she wasn't interested.Thats when i broke down and asked didn't you guys see a bright light they said no. so after all that i just described my question is there anyone that has had this type of experience.
i used to think that i was a tough guy standing 6'3 200 pounds living in a tough city but after that situation i found out that i am not as tough as i thought i was. willing to listen from anyone willing to help. thanks
content.summary: a ufo in ny attached me>

content.detailedDescription: 6 objetos luminosos , claramente ovnis muy luinosos volando en  direcciones imposibles para un avion , en vertical , horizontal, etc..Con rastro luminoso
content.summary: 6 objetos llameantes en varia direcciones

content.detailedDescription: At about 7:40am on oct 28 2013 a comercial jet did a nose dive then 2 fighter jets coming from the south fired a missel or rocket that chased after a white ball like thing that went into a cloud came out at a 45 degree angle and effertlsly excellerated out of the reach of the missel it wasnt like on tv it just went faster the the missel streight up the missle tryed to turn but couldnt and i lost track of where it went 15
content.summary: A  white spot being chased by fighter jets

content.detailedDescription: Arrived at work locking truck door noticed light out of the corner of my eye thought it was a shooting star as a lifetime sky watcher i was quick to look. suprized when i saw it come closer and so close. as it passed right over my head soundlessly at such a low altittude i could see it was a large triangle with 3 small lights one on each corner. it was only a few hundred feet incredbly low so i could see it was only about 40 feet wide. i knew instantly what it was as i have seen many strange lights and crafts both in the atmosphere and outside of it including one other triangle in wisconsin in the 70's which was the size of a city block with lights all around its edges and it made a humming noise hovering just above the tree line moving very slowly but last saturdays stunning triangle moved very fast maybe 100 mph. i was fairly awestruck at how close it was absolutely amazing. never saw one so close before. it was"more than silent" is the only way i can put it. one could see that its movement had nothing to do with air or "lift" more like it was floating and gave the appearance of not moving fast so much as being in a hurry, it was following the bay shore. awesome. i searched for reports from anyone else and was surprised to find none. but it was 3:45am and there was nobody around really. it flew north towards san rafael and out of sight.
content.summary: Silent triangle 3 small lights at points

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the garden at night and saw what looked like a very bright star but it was obviously moving slightly. it seemed like it was trying to be still, like a helicopter hovering in the wind, but every now and then it would move away slightly but quickly, and then return to the same general spot. it was very slowly getting lower. it was a constant bright light and made no noise. it seemed to be about a mile or two away and maybe half a mile or a mile above ground. i looked at it through binnoculars but couldn't see anything but the brighness of the light.

i watched it for 20 minutes and then got bored!! i went out for about half hour and when i came home it was gone :-/
content.summary: Bright constant star like light hovering and moving around like a hand held gun laser sight on a target and very slowly descending
